channel.title: Duping Threads
channel.description:
Ok, it appears that everyone is trying to find out their own method of duplicating items in game. However I can tell you now, this is fairly not possible!
Edit the client all you want but you should know this:
[ul][li]All items are created and deleted via the server. Your client will act upon the server's items and that is it. You can create things client side, but their isn't anything in the client that calls the server to create a new item because, the server is the only thing that creates items.[/li] [li]Duping as of now, is not possible.[/li][/ul]
I hope this clears up most questions :)

item.title: Duping Threads
item.dc:creator: @iruleatants iruleatants
item.description:
@iruleatants wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:16, topic:1880”][quote author=iruleatants link=topic=1948.msg19781#msg19781 date=1146163372]
seriously, i mean it

the money has to be made on way or the other right? WE NEED TO FIND HOW!!! i mean if we can replicate the money making process, then we could have billions in “conterfiet” gold pieces(how do you tell if its real or not)
[/quote]

im sorry iruleants, i try to be nice all the time but im going to have to be sarcastic here to try to get my point across, its nothing personal against you:
but what do you expect us to say? “omg, why didnt we think of this before, we just have to find out HOW THEY MAKE THE MONEY and then we can make billions and billions, its really simple but we just spend hours upon hours trying to auto when we could just MAKE THE MONEY LIKE JAGEX DOES” I mean comon? do you actually think noone has tried to “make money” OF COURSE we have tried it, every item (yes that includes gp) is made serverside, so there is NO WAY to make money, unless you can break into the place jagex keeps thier servers, and make it from there, sorry :([/quote]

so your telling me, your all great hackers but you can break into a server, DAMN, no mean to be mean but you all suck, im gonna talk to void, he can get in there in like 5 mins, and then…

i cant belive that you people never tried breaking into the server, shoulda done that first before artmoney…

Read full topic

item.title: Duping Threads
item.dc:creator: @Stinky_Keys Stinky Keys
item.description:
@Stinky_Keys wrote:

[quote=“iruleatants, post:13, topic:1880”]seriously, i mean it

the money has to be made on way or the other right? WE NEED TO FIND HOW!!! i mean if we can replicate the money making process, then we could have billions in “conterfiet” gold pieces(how do you tell if its real or not)[/quote]

You can replicate the “money making process” but all you can change is on the client-side. The server ultimately controls all the creation of gp. So basically your client can tell the server whatever it wants, but the server has to agree. Basically your client would say “Hey server, I just recieved got 100M GPs”, and the server would just say “I didn’t make those gps for you, so you’re full of shit and don’t get gps”. The method used to dupe in the past basically just confused the server. If i remember correctly you basically told the server “Hey server, I’m going to trade a stack of 0 pink party hats” and the server said got confused about a stack of 0 pink party hats, and translated it as no party hats being offered by the giver and 1 party hat being traded to the reciever. The glitch in the server was that it alowed stacks of unstackable items.

Read full topic

We should make one for RuneScape, so people can see exactly what the client/server relation is.
